import React from 'react' export const Movie = ({Movie}) => { console.log('users length:::', Movie.length) if (Movie.length === 0) return null const UserRow = (user,index) => { return( {index + 1} {Movie.firstName} {Movie.lastName} {Movie.email} ) } const userTable = users.map((Movie,index) => UserRow(Movie,index)) return(

Users

{userTable}
User Id Firstname Lastname Email
) }
